definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be prudent (Gerber:47 denom. fr. [[שֶׂכֶל]], but vb. early; NH [[סָכַל]], Hithp. shew oneself attentive (to), look; Aram. [[סְכַל]] (rare) understand, Ithpa. look (at), consider, Aph. instruct; [[שְׂכַל]] only Aph. (for Heb. [[הִשְׂכִּיל]]), understand, make wise; skal Pa. teach, Ethpa. understand, etc.; Sam. skl Ithpa. look (for Heb. [[הִבִּיט]]); As. šiklu, clever, šklûtu, cleverness, Meissn:Suppl.93);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3ms. ´[[שׂ]]: 1Sa 18:30 be prudent, circumspect (SS HPS); Kit Buhl Gerber al. prosper.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִשְׂכִּיל]] Je 23:5, 1Ch 28:19; 1 s. [[הִשְׂכַּלְתִּי]] Ps 119:99; 3mp1. [[הִשְׂכִּילוּ]] Job 34:27 +; Impf. [[יַשְׂכִּיל]] 1Sa 18:5 +; 2 ms. juss. [[תַּשְׂכַּל]] Da 9:25, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[הַשְׂכִּילוּ]] Ps 2:10; Inf. abs. [[הַשְׂכֵּל]] Je 9:23 +; [[הַשְׂכֵּיל]] (Ges: § 53 k) Je 3:15 Job 34:35; cstr. [[הַשְׂכִּיל]] Ge 3:6 +, etc.; Pt. [[מַשְׂכִּיל]] 1Sa 18:14 +, f. [[מַשְׂכָָּלֶת]] Pr 19:14; pl. [[מַשְׂכִּילִים]] Da 11:35 +, etc.; meanings hard to classify: scholars differ greatly;—
look at: [[נְחְמָד הָעֵץ לְהַשְׂכִּיל]] Ge 3:6 (J) was desirable to look upon (so LXX Ges De; AV, RV to make one wise; Ew Di Buhl SS Dr al. sub
give attention to, consider, ponder: Is 41:20, Is 44:18, De 32:29, Ps 64:10, Ps 106:7, Job 34:27; c. [[לְ]] Pr 21:12; c. [[אֶל]] Ps 41:2, Ne 8:13; c. [[עַל]] Pr 16:20; c. [[ב]] Ps 101:2, Da 9:13.

cause to consider, give insight, teach: ´[[י]]: subj., acc. rei, 1Ch 28:19, acc. pers. Ps 32:8, Ne 9:20; Gabriel subj., 2 acc. Da 9:22; [[לֵב חָכָם]] subj., acc. rei Pr 16:23; c. [[לְ]], Pr 21:11; ´[[הַמַּשְׂכִּילִים שֵׂכֶל טוֹב לי]]: 2Ch 30:22 (but Be Ke Benz etc. who shewed good skill, sc. in music, v:2Ch 30:21); [[מַוְכִּילִים]]([[הַ]]) Da 11:33, Da 11:35, Da 12:3, Da 12:10 the teachers (so Ew Hi Bev; Thes Ke Behrm al. the wise).

act circumspectly, prudently: abs. Am 5:13, Ps 2:10, Ps 36:4; [[מַשְׂכִּיל]] as subst. Ps 14:2 = Ps 53:3, Pr 10:5, Pr 10:19, Pr 14:35, Pr 15:24, Pr 17:2, Job 22:2; [[אִשָּׁה מַשְׂכָָּלֶת]] Pr 19:14.—Je 50:9 has [[גִּבּוֹר מַשְׁכִּיל]] acc. to Mas. (van d. H. Baer Gi), cf. Vulgate, i.e. a child-slaying warrior; but ´[[שׁ]]:

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: elsewhere only Ho 9:14, of miscarriage; LXX SyrVer Ew and most mod. (Gf Gie Rothst) read [[מַשְׂכִּיל]], either skilful or fortunate.

prosper, have success (cf. Dr: 1Sa 18:5): abs. 1Sa 18:15, Is 52:13, Je 10:21, Je 20:11, Je 23:5, Jos 1:8 (D); c. [[ב]], v:Jos 1:7 (D) 1Sa 18:5, 1Sa 18:14 (rd. [[בְּכָל־]] for [[לְכָל־]] Vrss Th HPS al.), cf. 2Ki 18:7; c. [[אֶל]], Pr 17:8.
